title: Tour de France Destroys Champs-Élysées Script, Confirms Details of Explosive Final Stage for 2025
content:
Organizers put a radical spin on traditional Paris finale with three climbs of Montmartre before 7km dash toward the Champs. Will we see GC action on the very final day of racing?

Read the full article at Tour de France Destroys Champs-Élysées Script, Confirms Details of Explosive Final Stage for 2025 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
